snippet: Two Europeans released Monday after five months as prisoners of Syrian rebels disagree on whether an overheard Skype conversation is proof that insurgents used gas to frame the government and provoke intervention.
abstract: Two Europeans released Monday after five months as prisoners of Syrian rebels disagree on whether an overheard Skype conversation is proof that insurgents used gas to frame the government and provoke intervention.

headline.main: Freed Captives Differ on Claim Syrian Rebels Framed Assad With Gas Attack

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
